std_narrative.citation:
Frederick (age 22) married Lavinia Maria Jackson (age 20) on 24 June 1878 in Dwelling house of Mr Nicholson, Baker Street, District of Auckland, New Zealand. '''Marriage''': "Intentions to Marry, 1878"
Reference: Registrar-General of Births, Deaths and Marriages, Notices of intention to marry, Series 8937, R2840390, Archives New Zealand Te Rua Mahara o te KƒÅwanatanga, Wellington
